answers.answer: Are u asking if this is normal? It happened to me all the time at work with my 1st and a few times with my second so far at 20 weeks.  it helps to eat something get alot of water and slow down.
Definitely tell your Dr about that... It could be preeclampsia... It could also just be your blood pressure is low, but in both cases it can be serious

question: Went to Walmart today  in I start feeling light headed, dizzy, hot, n got a headache, it felt like I was going to pass out
title: dizzy
